item.description:
You do not want to miss this one!!! Join us to learn about sustainable food from renown sushi chef Bun Lai. He will be offering up a feast of his creations to you while we share a glass, or two of wine or sake, and discuss sustainable farming, fishing, cooking and eating at my place.

Bun Lai is the owner and executive chef of Miya's Sushi in New Haven. http://miyassushi.com/

He is a celebrity chef in his own right focused on spreading the gospel of sustainability and an artist of amazing creativity evolving the very reality of sushi for the next century.

http://miyassushi.com/about-bun-lai/

To learn a bit more about sustainability: http://www.bujournalism.com/freeradicalsmag/onthewater/sustainable-sushi/

http://www.montereybayaquarium.org/cr/seafoodwatch.aspx?c=dd

This event is a once in a lifetime opportunity for any foodie. You won't want to miss this intimate evening with remarkable food made just for you by this remarkable chef.

Normally, Chef Lai has fees for appearing but for us he has asked only that we cover the cost of his making us dinner. You must pay when you RSVP. We'll be using my secure paypal account.

Sign up quickly, the space is limited and there will be no extra attendees added this time.

We've done a lot of fun and cool things but this is going to be the most wicked awesome night of food yet!
item.how_to_find_us: I will send the address a few days before the event
item.name: An Intimate Dinner with Bun Lai of Miya's Sushi here at my place.
